adHeader: One-Stop Shop DJ! for Weddings//Private parties
adDetails: All under one roof! DJ + emcee, UPLIGHTING, VIDEO PROJECTOR, AND SCREEN! Why run around and waste time, get it all done HERE! Our DJ company has been in business since 1999, providing professional quality music and sound systems for the BEST value on c.l. SEE OUR WEBSITE: www.kingdjcompany.com for songlists, FAQ, photo gallery, & more! * Uplighting [as many as 25 LED PAR64 light fixtures, DMX cables] CHOICE OF ANY COLOR! We are always booking private parties, wedding receptions, and special events so contact us A.S.A.P.! BOOK EARLY FOR DISCOUNTS! We accept ALL major credit cards and personal checks. We look very much forward to hearing from you.
